reviews.review: Beautifully bright 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display.1 Ceramic Shield with four times better drop performance.2 Incredible low-light photography with Night mode on all cameras. Cinema-grade Dolby Vision video recording, editing and playback. Powerful A14 Bionic chip. And new MagSafe accessories for easy attachment and faster wireless charging.3 Let the fun begin.
